Description: Photograph (black and white), from an album; view of a road lined by trees, with a river next to it (the Nile), leading to the pyramids, Khafre, Khufu and Menkaura, which are visible in the background; Giza, Egypt. Gelatin silver print
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Noelle Ora Sandwith
Curator's comments: Related collections: This group of photographs relates to other photographs and works of art donated by Noelle Sandwith (See Oc,B134 and 135, among others).
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Pyramid of Khafra
Topographic representation of: Pyramid of Khufu
Topographic representation of: Pyramid of Menkaura
Acquisition notes: This Album is part of a collection received by the British Museum as a gift from the artist herself (Picdoc 168 and Eth doc 1054).
